an9.11:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an9.11:1.2: Atha kho ayasma sariputto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
an9.11:1.6: Atha kho ayasma sariputto utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
an9.11:1.7: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu acirapakkante ayasmante sariputte bhagavantam etadavoca:
an9.11:1.8: “ayasma mam, bhante, sariputto asajja appatinissajja carikam pakkanto”ti.
an9.11:1.9: Atha kho bhagava annataram bhikkhum amantesi:
an9.11:1.10: “ehi tvam, bhikkhu, mama vacanena sariputtam amantehi:
an9.11:1.12: “Evam, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva yenayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
an9.11:1.14: “Evamavuso”ti kho ayasma sariputto tassa bhikkhuno paccassosi.
an9.11:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma ca mahamoggallano ayasma ca anando avapuranam adaya vihare ahindanti:
an9.11:2.3: Idanayasma sariputto bhagavato sammukha sihanadam nadissati”ti.
an9.11:2.4: Atha kho ayasma sariputto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam sariputtam bhagava etadavoca:
an9.11:2.5: “idha te, sariputta, annataro sabrahmacari khiyanadhammam apanno:
an9.11:2.6: ‘ayasma mam, bhante, sariputto asajja appatinissajjacarikam pakkanto’”ti.
an9.11:3.1: “Yassa nuna, bhante, kaye kayagatasati anupatthita assa, so idha annataram sabrahmacarim asajja appatinissajja carikam pakkameyya.
an9.11:4.1: Seyyathapi, bhante, pathaviyam sucimpi nikkhipanti asucimpi nikkhipanti guthagatampi nikkhipanti muttagatampi nikkhipanti khelagatampi nikkhipanti pubbagatampi nikkhipanti lohitagatampi nikkhipanti, na ca tena pathavi attiyati va harayati va jigucchati va;
an9.11:4.2: evamevam kho aham, bhante, pathavisamena cetasa viharami vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyapajjena.
an9.11:4.3: Yassa nuna, bhante, kaye kayagatasati anupatthita assa, so idha annataram sabrahmacarim asajja appatinissajja carikam pakkameyya.
an9.11:5.1: Seyyathapi, bhante, apasmim sucimpi dhovanti asucimpi dhovanti guthagatampi … muttagatampi … khelagatampi … pubbagatampi … lohitagatampi dhovanti, na ca tena apo attiyati va harayati va jigucchati va;
an9.11:5.2: evamevam kho aham, bhante, aposamena cetasa viharami vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyapajjena.
an9.11:5.3: Yassa nuna, bhante, kaye kayagatasati anupatthita assa, so idha annataram sabrahmacarim asajja appatinissajja carikam pakkameyya.
an9.11:6.1: Seyyathapi, bhante, tejo sucimpi dahati asucimpi dahati guthagatampi … muttagatampi … khelagatampi … pubbagatampi … lohitagatampi dahati, na ca tena tejo attiyati va harayati va jigucchati va;
an9.11:6.2: evamevam kho aham, bhante, tejosamena cetasa viharami vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyapajjena.
an9.11:6.3: Yassa nuna, bhante, kaye kayagatasati anupatthita assa, so idha annataram sabrahmacarim asajja appatinissajja carikam pakkameyya.
an9.11:7.1: Seyyathapi, bhante, vayo sucimpi upavayati asucimpi upavayati guthagatampi … muttagatampi … khelagatampi … pubbagatampi … lohitagatampi upavayati, na ca tena vayo attiyati va harayati va jigucchati va;
an9.11:7.2: evamevam kho aham, bhante, vayosamena cetasa viharami vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyapajjena.
an9.11:7.3: Yassa nuna, bhante, kaye kayagatasati anupatthita assa, so idha annataram sabrahmacarim asajja appatinissajja carikam pakkameyya.
an9.11:8.1: Seyyathapi, bhante, rajoharanam sucimpi punchati asucimpi punchati guthagatampi … muttagatampi … khelagatampi … pubbagatampi … lohitagatampi punchati, na ca tena rajoharanam attiyati va harayati va jigucchati va;
an9.11:8.2: evamevam kho aham, bhante, rajoharanasamena cetasa viharami vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyapajjena.
an9.11:8.3: Yassa nuna, bhante, kaye kayagatasati anupatthita assa, so idha annataram sabrahmacarim asajja appatinissajja carikam pakkameyya.
an9.11:9.1: Seyyathapi, bhante, candalakumarako va candalakumarika va kalopihattho nantakavasi gamam va nigamam va pavisanto nicacittamyeva upatthapetva pavisati;
an9.11:9.2: evamevam kho aham, bhante, candalakumarakacandalakumarikasamena cetasa viharami vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyapajjena.
an9.11:9.3: Yassa nuna, bhante, kaye kayagatasati anupatthita assa, so idha annataram sabrahmacarim asajja appatinissajja carikam pakkameyya.
an9.11:10.1: Seyyathapi, bhante, usabho chinnavisano surato sudanto suvinito rathiyaya rathiyam singhatakena singhatakam anvahindanto na kinci himsati padena va visanena va;
an9.11:10.2: evamevam kho aham, bhante, usabhachinnavisanasamena cetasa viharami vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyapajjena.
an9.11:10.3: Yassa nuna, bhante, kaye kayagatasati anupatthita assa, so idha annataram sabrahmacarim asajja appatinissajja carikam pakkameyya.
an9.11:11.1: Seyyathapi, bhante, itthi va puriso va daharo yuva mandanakajatiko sisamnhato ahikunapena va kukkurakunapena va manussakunapena va kanthe asattena attiyeyya harayeyya jiguccheyya;
an9.11:11.2: evamevam kho aham, bhante, imina putikayena attiyami harayami jigucchami.
an9.11:11.3: Yassa nuna, bhante, kaye kayagatasati anupatthita assa, so idha annataram sabrahmacarim asajja appatinissajja carikam pakkameyya.
an9.11:12.1: Seyyathapi, bhante, puriso medakathalikam parihareyya chiddavachiddam uggharantam paggharantam;
an9.11:12.2: evamevam kho aham, bhante, imam kayam pariharami chiddavachiddam uggharantam paggharantam.
an9.11:12.3: Yassa nuna, bhante, kaye kayagatasati anupatthita assa, so idha annataram sabrahmacarim asajja appatinissajja carikam pakkameyya”ti.
an9.11:13.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu utthayasana ekamsam uttarasangam karitva bhagavato padesu sirasa nipatitva bhagavantam etadavoca:
an9.11:13.2: “accayo mam, bhante, accagama yathabalam yathamulham yathaakusalam, yo aham ayasmantam sariputtam asata tuccha musa abhutena abbhacikkhim.
an9.11:13.3: Tassa me, bhante, bhagava accayam accayato patigganhatu ayatim samvaraya”ti.
an9.11:13.4: “Taggha tam, bhikkhu, accayo accagama yathabalam yathamulham yathaakusalam, yo tvam sariputtam asata tuccha musa abhutena abbhacikkhi.
an9.11:13.5: Yato ca kho tvam, bhikkhu, accayam accayato disva yathadhammam patikarosi, tam te mayam patigganhama.
an9.11:13.6: Vuddhihesa, bhikkhu, ariyassa vinaye yo accayam accayato disva yathadhammam patikaroti ayatim samvaram apajjati”ti.
an9.11:14.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam sariputtam amantesi:
an9.11:14.2: “khama, sariputta, imassa moghapurisassa, pura tassa tattheva sattadha muddha phalati”ti.
an9.11:14.3: “Khamamaham, bhante, tassa ayasmato sace mam so ayasma evamaha:
